BT.modules.UC.mainContent

Class UCMainContentModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.managers.MainContentController
      • BT.modules.UC.mainContent.UCMainContentModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawingClicks
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UCMainContentController

    public abstract class UCMainContentModel
extends MainContentController
    This class manages useCae main content data. It also handles mouse and keyboard button listeners.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected UCLeftBottomContent LeftBottomContent
      Left bottom content with buttons to set which line should be used.
      protected UCLeftTopContent LeftTopContent
      Left Top content with buttons to set which object should be added.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UCMainContentModel

        public UCMainContentModel(DiagramPlacesManager diagramPlaces)
        Basic constructor. It sets DiagramPlacesManager which stores each object off managed file. It also set places to ucPlaces and create new mainContent.
        Parameters:
        diagramPlaces - DiagramPlacesManager with each object of useCase, class diagram and OOPN.

    • Method Detail

      • setLeftBottomContent

        public void setLeftBottomContent(UCLeftBottomContent LeftBottomContent)
        Set left bottom content which has buttons for setting type of added join edge.
        Parameters:
        LeftBottomContent - UCLeftBottomContent with buttons to specify which join edge should be added.

      • setLeftTopContent

        public void setLeftTopContent(UCLeftTopContent LeftTopContent)
        Set left top content which has buttons for setting type of added objects.
        Parameters:
        LeftTopContent - UCLeftTopContent with buttons to specify which object should be added.

      • getLeftBottomContent

        public UCLeftBottomContent getLeftBottomContent()
        Get left bottom content. Which has buttons for setting type of added join edges.
        Returns:
        UCLeftBottomContent with buttons for adding join edges on useCase drawing panel.

      • getLeftTopContent

        public UCLeftTopContent getLeftTopContent()
        Get left top content. Which has buttons for setting type of added objects.
        Returns:
        UCLeftTopContent with buttons for adding objects on useCase drawing panel.

      • setButtonsListeners

        public void setButtonsListeners()
        Create listeners to delete and escape keyboard buttons.

      • removeLineFromArrayListAndSetNewLine

        public void removeLineFromArrayListAndSetNewLine(UCJoinEdgeController joinEdge)
        Remove line from array and set new line. Remove desired line from array of objects and create new join edge based on this line.
        Parameters:
        joinEdge - UCJoinEdgeController line to be removed.
